import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default class Main extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { nome: '', contatos: [] } this.livesearch = React.createRef(this); this.inputRef = React.createRef(this); this.procurar = this.procurar.bind(this); } componentDidMount() { axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/v1`) .then(res => { const contatos = res.data; this.setState({ contatos }); }) } procurar() { this.nome = this.inputRef.current.value; axios.get(`http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/v1/find/` + this.nome) .then(res => { const contatos = res.data; this.setState({ contatos }); }) } render() { return (
